column2:
Signet Passive: Grants health every time you cast a spell.
Signet Active: Heal yourself.
Immobilize your foe with hands erupting from the ground.
Coat the target area in ice, chilling foes that enter it.

<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a fiery greatsword in your hands and at the target location. When it lands, it damages and burns foes. Wielders of this weapon gain increased power and condition damage and cast <c=@abilitytype>Lesser Fiery Eruption</c> at regular intervals on random enemies.
Hit multiple foes with arcs of chain lightning.
Hurl a rock and weaken your foe.
Protect yourself with frost armor that reduces incoming damage by 10%%. While active, it chills foes that hit you. Each attacker can be affected by this only once per second.
Envelop yourself in stony armor, making yourself invulnerable.
Make the earth churn, crippling nearby foes before unleashing a seismic wave that damages and bleeds them.
Fling fire in a claw-shaped spread at your foe.
Use the earth to launch yourself into the air and strike foes in a small radius. Deliver a larger ring of earthen spikes upon impact.
Cast an arc of electricity at your foe.
Shake the ground until it erupts and damages foes.
Ride the lightning to your foe, then strike all nearby foes with an electrical burst. If a foe is hit by the burst, the skill's recharge is halved.
Create a swirling wind that blocks projectiles.

Those dings and scratches just give the armor more character."
—Bracctus"
Spray an icy blast in a cone that damages foes and heals allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Arcane.</c> Blast your foe with energy for critical damage.
<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a lava axe in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of the weapon gain increased power and condition damage.

Signet Passive: Improves critical chance.
Signet Active: Burn your target and nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a magnetic shield in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of the weapon gain increased toughness and vitality.
Unleash a magnetic force, surging at your opponent and dazing them, while gaining magnetic aura.
Strike a foe with your banner and inflict vulnerability.
Shoots an explosive round at the target. Rifle may explode.
Discharges a short range explosive. Rifle may explode.
Fire a volley of shots at your foe. Rifle may explode.
Hold and release to shoot your foe and make them vulnerable. Hold longer for more damage. This causes the rifle to explode.
Aim downwards and blast off the ground to fly at a foe. Rifle may explode.
Make lava erupt from the target area.
Drop a giant ice spike on foes to make them vulnerable.
Call down a healing rain on the target area, granting regeneration to allies and curing conditions once every three seconds.
Push foes backward with a burst of air.
<c=@abilitytype>Cantrip.</c> Morph into an invulnerable, vaporous mist for a brief time.
Help the Blood Legion combat ghost siege weapons.
Damage foes, cure three of your conditions, and reflect projectiles with a magnetic surge.
Chill your foe for a brief time.
Damage foes in a cone in front of you. Deal more damage to burning foes.
Quickly dash along the ground, summoning spikes along the way and then delivering an area strike.
Summon a geyser to heal nearby allies.
Knock down your foe with a charged wind blast.
Assume a mobile, vaporous form, returning to a downed state when the effect ends.
Blind your foe with superheated water.
<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a frost bow in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of this weapon gain increased condition duration and healing power.

Signet Passive: Reduces incoming condition duration.
Signet Active: Damage and chill foes while healing and reviving allies in an area.

Signet Passive: Grants a 25%% increase in movement speed.
Signet Active: Blind your target and nearby foes.
Stun nearby attacking foes with an electric shock (only once per 2 seconds for each attacker).
Chill foes that strike you (only once per second for each attacker); incoming damage is reduced by 10%%.
Drop a stimulant that grants fury and swiftness.
Launch three waves of heat. Each burns foes and grants vigor to allies.
You cannot use skills as a whirlpool.
Shoots a slow-moving orb that detonates upon impact.
Create a wall of ice that shatters when touched by enemies or when it expires, dealing heavy damage and chilling foes.
Charge forward with tidal force, damaging foes and healing allies.
Throw a punch of concentrated water.
Wrap your foot in stone and kick your foe.
Float to the surface on a burst of steam, blinding and burning foes.
Detonate your ice globe to damage foes.
Detonate your ice wall to damage and chill foes.
Smack your foe with the magnetic shield.
Use magnetism to envelop yourself in a shield, becoming invulnerable.
<c=@abilitytype>Cantrip.</c> Protect yourself with earth armor and gain protection and stability.
Slide forward and blast the area, leaving behind a line of fire that burns foes.
Shock foes around you and inflict weakness on them. Gain fury for each foe hit.
Trap your foe in an air bubble and make them float to the surface.
Create an electrical field that stuns foes crossing it.
Release a slow-moving, detonatable air pocket. When it explodes, you teleport to that location.
Charge the water around your foe with electricity. Enemies currently using an ability are dazed.
Fire three bolts of lightning in an arc in front of you.
Shoot three rocky blades at your foe.
Spray a cone of gravel to bleed foes.
Anchor a rock to your foe, making them sink.
Cloud the water to blind your target and nearby foes.
Launch a large magnetic force that reflects projectiles along its path, crippling foes that touch it.
Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Envelop yourself in a fiery shield that burns foes and grants might each time you are struck (cooldown of 1 second per attacker).
Burn foes at the target location.
Quickly roll backward, leaving behind a line of fire that burns.
Create a geyser to heal nearby allies.
You and nearby allies gain swiftness, while curing crippled, immobilized, and chilled.
Gain swiftness from a gust of wind that launches nearby foes.
Cast a vapor blade that inflicts vulnerability and returns to you.
Trigger a quake at your location, knocking down foes and dealing massive damage.
Damage nearby foes with a ring of fire, burning foes that pass through it.
Drop an explosive dragon's tooth on your foe.
Fire three ice shards at your foe.
Blind your foes with a blast of sand.
Fire a blast so strong it launches your foe as you fall backward and cures immobilized, crippled, and chilled.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with healing skills.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with grenade skills.
<c=@abilitytype>Gadget.</c> Launch a target foe with a concealed ram head.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with bomb skills.
Set a timed charge with a big blast that launches nearby foes.
Deliver a quick rifle shot from the hip that pierces targets.
Fire a cloud of shrapnel that causes more damage the closer you are to foes.
Recipe[s]: Extended Potion of Ghost Slaying
Blast the ground, damaging nearby foes and leaping to your target.
Throw a bit of junk and inflict a random condition on your foe.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Drink Elixir B to gain fury, might, retaliation, and swiftness.
Set a timed charge that creates a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Gadget.</c> Spray oil behind you, knocking down foes. If underwater, foes entering the field are blinded and slowed.
Fire a volley of darts that poison foes.
Discharge a lightning shot that bounces between multiple foes, blinding and confusing them.
Coat the target area with a glue puddle that immobilizes foes on impact, then cripples foes that remain within.
Unleash flames from your pistol to burn foes. Deals more damage the closer you are.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Drink Elixir H to heal yourself and gain protection, regeneration, and swiftness.
Throw out a remote-controlled land mine that damages nearby foes.
Detonate your mine, damaging nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Drink Elixir C, converting all conditions into boons.
<c=@abilitytype>Gadget.</c> Break out of stun, gaining resistance and clearing blindness.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Toss Elixir R to revive allies at a location.
Fire a shot that homes in on your foe.
Retreat while firing a grappling line at your foe that pulls them toward you and inflicts bleeding.
Double-click to learn how to make the Extended Potion of Outlaw Slaying.
Launch a deployable net wall to immobilize foes caught within.
Recipe[s]: Extended Potion of Outlaw Slaying
Overcharge your thumper turret to launch nearby foes.
Overcharge your turret to fire an electrified net that immobilizes and stuns.
Overcharge your flame turret, releasing a smoke screen that blinds nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Equip a kit that gives you a variety of tools.
Confuse your foe by smacking them with a pry bar.
Double-click to learn how to make the Extended Potion of Dredge Slaying.
Overcharge your turret to fire explosive rockets.
Throw out a mine that explodes on contact.
Inflate a buoy, floating more quickly to the surface.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Arm yourself with a flamethrower that replaces your weapon skills.
Spray fire in a cone pattern while moving, burning foes on the final attack. Deals 10%% bonus damage to burning targets.
Burn foes with a wall of napalm at the target location.
Fire a napalm ball that rolls through foes and explodes.
<c=@abilitytype>Engineering Kit.</c> Arm yourself with an elixir gun that replaces your weapon skills.
Fire a dart that bleeds and weakens foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Leap backward, spraying an acidic elixir on the ground that damages nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Launch an elixir orb, healing allies on impact and creating an area of continual healing.
Shoot out a spread of remote-detonated mines.
Recipe[s]: Extended Potion of Dredge Slaying
Double-click to learn how to make the Extended Potion of Nightmare Court Slaying.
Block, then counter with a kick and a quick retreat.
Throw out a grappling line to pull your foe to you.
Set off an explosive booby trap, launching nearby foes with a powerful blast.
Spray a cone of elixir fumes, inflicting poison and vulnerability to foes and curing conditions on allies with every strike.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Vent a healing mist, granting regeneration to yourself and allies.
Burn foes with your next three attacks.
<c=@abilitytype>Elixir.</c> Toss Elixir H to grant protection, regeneration, and vigor to allies.
Overcharge your healing turret to cure conditions and grant a burst of healing.
Use your rocket boots to do an explosive kick that burns foes.
Recipe[s]: Extended Potion of Nightmare Court Slaying
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Deploy a turret that burns foes.

The icebrood of Drakkar Spurs are still a threat, but with your help, we've been able to strike back and restore a level of balance. You've done well in the service of Koda. I thank you on behalf of all the kodan people.

—Worthy Burden
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a rifle turret that shoots at foes.

You've performed a combo!

To combo, use a finisher skill through a field skill. You may combo by yourself or with your allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a high-health thumper turret that damages nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a turret that fires rockets.
Scatter nails that bleed and cripple foes.
Throw on the ground to burn the area for a period of time.
Use under a lightning storm to trap some lightning in your jar.
Throw your jar to break it and release an angry swarm of bees.
+250 Damage. Range Attack. Knocks down your target.
Knock down a foe with your shovel.
Smack some poor foe with a cow leg.
Place the powder keg at your feet. Will detonate after a few seconds.
Use the rock to block a skritt tunnel.
Deploys a machine that shakes the ground and attracts wurms.
Free this furry little friend. Maybe he'll help you!
Smack someone with these nasty grapes!
Blind a target with a handful of grapes.
Place a mine that burns and damages foes.
+250 Damage. Ranged Attack. Knocks down target.
Smack your foe with a metal bar. It has a chance to break.
Break your metal bar on a foe's head to stun them.
Place a large bomb on the ground that explodes after 10 seconds.
Spin attack to knock back foes.
Throw a putrid arm that explodes in a poisonous cloud.
Throw the gourd, doing damage and knocking down your target.
Smack a foe down with the grawl food sack. There is a chance that the bag will burst and be destroyed.
Land a vicious bite on your target for heavy damage.
Leap at your target, damaging them and knocking them down.
Let out a terrifying snarl to unearth any dredge hiding nearby.
Smack a foe. There is a chance that the package will burst and be destroyed.
Consume some of the contents for a speed boost.
Unable to use skills or move.
